casebody.data:
2001-3024 (La. 10/25/02)

STATE of Louisiana v. Brian HARPER. No. 2001-KO-3024. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 25, 2002.

In re Harper, Brian-Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Orleans, Criminal District Court Div. A, No. 387-655; to the Court of *1173Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2001-KA-0839.

Denied.
